body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Carl Hayes and the customer's name is Stephanie Simmons.  The conversation is about Happy Animal Shelter (a Animal Shelter ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Tech Solutions Inc. My name is Alex, and I will be assisting you today. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, my name is Jennifer.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jennifer. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have an issue with my laptop. It won't turn on.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Jennifer. I'll do my best to help you. Could you please provide your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Could you also provide your contact number in case we need to follow up on this issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my contact number is six six zero two zero zero one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thanks for providing the information. We'll look into the issue with your laptop and get back to you as soon as possible.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Alex. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Jennifer. Thank you for your time and have a great day! Goodbye!
